text: I should know the answer to this question but I have had a couple of issues with affecting currently used modules and it has made me a bit jumpy. At what point does making changes affect currently used properties in modules already used. For example I want to replace the default text in my custom module. If I do that will it then overwrite all my modules?
If I remember correctly I changed a module from non-global to global and it reset all the content to the default.
Ok so did a test module and replacing the default content doesnâ€™t seem to alter any existing content that has been added from the front end.
